message.body: Messaged*
Oh geez. I told him i would let him know but not if it would be awkward for him. God.
Oh you said that? Then WTF.
Well he doesnt know where it is
Is the address in the invite?
Negative
Mmk. Ignore? :/
I did. I feel bad. I could tell him i think it would be awkward for him but.. He obviously thinks it wouldnt
I think he lacks the social cues to know either way
I feel mean
I mean, he wouldnt enjoy himself.
I know but ignoring is hurtful
I think telling him that it was more intimate than planned and that he might feel uncomfortable would be fair and level
Okay i will do that

Oh man he just confronted me about it and said "please don't ignore me otherwise im only a ghost" that's not cool bc I've been inordinately open hearted with him in the past. Hea saying that he called you? Ugh. Its creepy. Don't feel mean, just tell him what's up.
He called?
He said he called you. I know he's just lonely but that's do creepy.
I know. Why does he feel entitled to do this stuff just because he is sad
Probably bc I've enabled it before. I don't know about you. It's emotional terrorism, and I would know...
Yeah. I have enabled too
It's not fair.
I mean, of him
I know. I wont play pity party damnit.
I told him that you probably don't have enough room and haven't got back to him about it like a normal person
